title: Magnesium Citrate
overview: Magnesium citrate is a highly bioavailable magnesium salt formed with citric acid. It appears as a white, slightly hygroscopic powder with a slightly acidic taste.

specifications.value: Between 14.5% to 16.4% elemental magnesium by weight

features: Water Soluble: Dissolves easily for efficient absorption
Bioavailability: Provides a readily absorbable form of magnesium for the body
Osmotic Laxative Properties: Can attract water into the intestines, softening stool, and promoting bowel movements
Potential Health Benefits: May support muscle function, nerve health, bone health, and cardiovascular health

applications.title: Pharmaceutical
applications.description: Dietary supplement for magnesium deficiency and laxative for short-term relief of constipation

applications.title: Nutraceutical
applications.description: May be combined with other vitamins and minerals in supplement formulations

applications.title: Food
applications.description: Potential use in fortified beverages (check regional regulations)
